frame.name: Member_of_military
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Person</fen> is a member of an organized military organization belonging to a nation-state or similar body. The military membership may be part-time, but is considered a job. This is in opposition to combatants who may be loyal to a particular cause but are not part of the military arm of a government.
<ex>The British at one point had an occupying army of over a million <fex name="Descriptor">well-trained</fex> <t><fex name="Person">soldiers</fex></t>.</ex>
<ex>After 9/11 she decided to become a <fex name="Contract_basis">full-time</fex> <t><fex name="Person">airman</fex></t></ex>.
<ex><fex name="Loyal_side">US</fex> <t><fex name="Person">soldiers</fex></t> have fought in the region for the past twenty years with no end in sight.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Origin
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Origin</fen> is the place where the <fen>Person</fen> was born or lived a salient part of her or his life.</def-root>

FE.name: Person
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Person</fen> is the member of the military.</def-root>

FE.name: Persistent_characteristic
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Persistent_characteristic</fen> is a physiological characteristic or personality trait of the <fen>Person</fen> which is concieved of as persisting over time.</def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Descriptor</fen> is a temporary condition of the <fen>Person</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Age
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Age</fen> is the length of time the <fen>Person</fen> has been alive.</def-root>

FE.name: Ethnicity
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Ethnicity</fen> is the religious, racial, national, socio-economic or cultural group to which the <fen>Person</fen> belongs.</def-root>

FE.name: Context_of_acquaintance
FE.definition:
<def-root>An expression indicating the context with which the <fen>Person</fen> is associated.
<ex>Is she the <t>marine</t> <fex name="coa">from the movie we saw last night</fex>?</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Rank
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>Rank</fen> is the position in the military hierarchy that the <fen>Person</fen> occupies.
<ex>Robin is the <fex name="rnk">highest-ranking</fex> <t>soldier</t> at the facility.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Place_of_employment
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the place where the <fen>Person</fen> is stationed.</def-root>

FE.name: Loyal_side
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Person</fen> belongs to the military of the <fen>Loyal_side</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Type
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies a more specific <fen>Type</fen> of military function or specialty that the <fen>Person</fen> has.</def-root>

FE.name: Compensation
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Compensation</fen> is the payment that the <fen>Person</fen> receives for performing military service.</def-root>

FE.name: Contract_basis
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Contract_basis</fen> describes the conditions of military membership with respect to permanency, time or duration of duty, payment basis, and so on.</def-root>

FE.name: Military_organization
FE.definition:
<def-root>The military organization to which the <fen>Person</fen> belongs.
<ex>Hundreds of <fex name="mil">US Navy</fex> <t><fex name="Person">sailors</fex></t> will be returning home soon.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: soldier.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a person who serves in an army.

lexUnit.name: marine.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a member of a marine corps.

lexUnit.name: sailor.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a member of a navy.

lexUnit.name: airman.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a member of the air force, especially of the US or UK.

lexUnit.name: troop.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a member of the armed forces, often referring to soliders.

lexUnit.name: service member.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a member of the armed forces.

lexUnit.name: commando.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: member of military unit designed for rapid and aggressive operations.
